forecast.day_comments: Snow showers.  High near 17. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 3 to 5 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow showers, mainly before 1am.  Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around -1. Wind chill values as low as -8. Northwest wind around 7 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
